channel.title: Next-Reality
channel.description:
[size=24pt][font=times new roman]Next-reality[/font][/size]
[size=12pt][font=times new roman]Information[/font][/size] -Next-Reality, a Source based off of Near-Reality -Revision: 317 -Owner:Me/Gary
[size=14pt]What I plan to do with this source, is Transform it into almost an Exact Copy of Near-Reality. But I need help with that, I need a Coder and a Web Developer. If you are interested in any of the postition's and you're an experienced coder, then please send me a PM on here. Or add me on Skype: radiaonline[/size]
[size=18pt][font=times new roman]--4.24.13-- Fixed Lagg when moving around --4.25.13- Added Donator Feature: Only donator's can fish rocktails Added Donator Feature "Restore Special Attack" --4.26.13-- Made the economy Stable Fixed the Whip Stance [Hit like a Dragon Scimitar Hit's] --4.27.13-- Fixed Range Weapons Fixed the Quest Tab :D --4.28.13-- Added that players cant xlog anymore Added Statius,Vesta etc. to PKP Shop Fixed City Teleport Statius,Vesta's,Zuriels now costs PKP Added Korasi Added Handcannon Added handcannon Shots --4.29.13-- Added 7 Suggestion open buttons at quest tab Added Request help for player Added confirm help for staff members Added KQ Fixed Prices Added City Teleport Added Staff commands Perfected every Special attack Fixed Primal Weapons Fixed KQ[/font][/size]

item.title: Next-Reality

item.description:

I have removed your other topic, please only create one thread per server.

Read full topic

item.title: Next-Reality
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

[quote=“Desolation, post:3, topic:518234”]Lol, I don’t do this for the Money at all, I do this for enjoyment Alright.
Don’t just come up in here and Call me Some Faggot.
Thanks[/quote]
He never called you any names, he explained to you where your thread would be supposed to be posted.

Now for feedback:
Use [code] tags when editing your development logs, it looks neater and it’s easier on the eyes.
Your updates so far are trivial, but I give you a pat-on-the-back for keeping track of every little thing. The small things are the most important, after all.
Provide some pictures that show the effort put into this project, it will attract more people to it.
Good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: Next-Reality
item.dc:creator: @Desolation Desolation
item.description:
@Desolation wrote:

                                                               [size=24pt][font=times new roman]Next-reality[/font][/size]

                                                                   [size=12pt][font=times new roman]Information[/font][/size]
                                         -Next-Reality, a Source based off of Near-Reality
                                         -Revision: 317
                                         -Owner:Me/Gary

[size=14pt]What I plan to do with this source, is Transform it into almost an Exact Copy of Near-Reality. But I need help with that, I need a Coder and a Web Developer.
If you are interested in any of the postition’s and you’re an experienced coder, then please send me a PM on here. Or add me on Skype: radiaonline[/size]

[size=18pt][font=times new roman]–4.24.13–
Fixed Lagg when moving around
–4.25.13-
Added Donator Feature: Only donator’s can fish rocktails
Added Donator Feature “Restore Special Attack”
–4.26.13–
Made the economy Stable
Fixed the Whip Stance [Hit like a Dragon Scimitar Hit’s]
–4.27.13–
Fixed Range Weapons
Fixed the Quest Tab
–4.28.13–
Added that players cant xlog anymore
Added Statius,Vesta etc. to PKP Shop
Fixed City Teleport
Statius,Vesta’s,Zuriels now costs PKP
Added Korasi
Added Handcannon
Added handcannon Shots
–4.29.13–
Added 7 Suggestion open buttons at quest tab
Added Request help for player
Added confirm help for staff members
Added KQ
Fixed Prices
Added City Teleport
Added Staff commands
Perfected every Special attack
Fixed Primal Weapons
Fixed KQ[/font][/size]
